feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:39 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 07:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: NNE 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain or snow near noon. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
